author: Jimmy Galvan Sports Editor
title: Katy takes bye week to heal wounds from early season
text: Larger font size Posted: Friday, October 2, 2015 1:00 pm Katy takes bye week to heal wounds from early season Jimmy Galvan Sports Editor Katy Times | 0 comments For a team that is 5-0 overall and 2-0 in district play, the Katy Tigers are probably a team that is not ready for a bye week.
